SENT.plain: Thirty-three patients with old brainstem infarct were studied with MR imaging at 1.5T
T1-weighted images were most useful for diagnosing brainstem infarct
Brainstem infarcts were most frequently observed at the central portion of the mid pons
All of the lesions of three patients with medullary infarct were right sided
Both of the lesions of two patients with midbrain infarct were relatively large
Brainstem infarcts frequently accompanied supratentorial lacunar infarcts and subcortical arteriosclerotic encephalopathy
